datasheets.name: Pilot Dantos and Thauvir

damaged.description: While this model has 1–4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.fluff: Amongst the most trusted of his lord and master’s bondsmen, Dantos pilots the Armiger Helverin Thauvir. Noted for his leadership and bravery, Dantos is often tasked with leading Armiger Trailblazers in the household vanguard.
datasheets.loadout: ■ This model is equipped with: 2 Armiger autocannons; Questoris heavy stubber; armoured feet.

datasheets.name: Pilot Morrigan and Viridor

damaged.description: While this model has 1–4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.fluff: Once a lowly retainer, Morrigan earned her position as bondsman by dint of loyal service and extreme bravery. Headstrong and zealous, she pilots the Armiger Warglaive known as Viridor.
datasheets.loadout: ■ This model is equipped with: Questoris heavy stubber; reaper chain-cleaver; thermal spear.

stratagems.name: Target Lock
stratagems.target: One ARMIGER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability, and each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.
stratagems.fluff: Fitted with high-grade auspicator systems, an Armiger’s capabilities are further enhanced. Once a target has been locked, there is no escaping the warsuit’s wrath.

stratagems.name: Terrifying Charge
stratagems.when: Your Charge phase, just after an ARMIGER unit from your army ends a Charge move.
stratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit within range of your unit. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.
stratagems.fluff: Armiger warsuits are large, fast and powerful. A head-on charge from such a machine is often enough to break the morale of the foe and put them to flight.

stratagems.name: Loping Gait
stratagems.target: One ARMIGER unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a move, it can move through enemy models. When doing so, it can move within Engagement Range of such models but cannot end that move within Engagement Range of them, and any Desperate Escape test is automatically passed.
stratagems.fluff: With their long limbs and powerful strides, Armiger warsuits are more than capable of striding through or darting past any enemies who block their path.

enhancements.name: Servo-skull Dataleech
enhancements.description: ARMIGER HELVERIN model only. Each time the bearer destroys an enemy CHARACTER unit, roll one D6: on a 2+, you gain 1CP.

enhancements.name: Embedded Auto Medicae
enhancements.description: ARMIGER WARGLAIVE model only. Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, the bearer can use this Enhancement. If it does, until the end of the phase, the bearer has the Feel No Pain 6+ ability.
